question: すごく
sourceMnemonic: This may look like a verb at first, but it's actually the adverb version of the adjective <ja>凄い</ja>. When something is <kanji>awful</kanji> it's usually <vocabulary>awfully</vocabulary> awful.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You've learned this reading already, so you should be able to read this on your own.
